questions.question: What is the dominant color of the text displayed on the product's label?
What is the overall shape of the container showing the ingredient list?
What is the apparent texture of the surface on which the text is printed?
Considering the font style, what is the general feel of the product's branding?
Based on the visual characteristics, is the label design minimalist or ornate?
What is the primary material of the label itself, judging from its appearance?
What is the predominant color of the background behind the text on the label?
What kind of typography is used for the word 'INGREDIENTS'?
Is the text on the label presented in a single column or multiple columns?
What is the case of the lettering used for the ingredient list?
Does the labeling include a list of ingredients or nutritional facts?
Considering the font size and line spacing, is the text easy or hard to read?
What is the orientation of the text on the packaging, vertical or horizontal?
From visual inspection, is the text printed or hand-written?
Excluding the ingredient names, are there other noticeable markings on the label?
